Here is the list of signs in the Astrology system ($line) along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural leader, assertive, but also impulsive.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Practical, reliable, but also stubborn.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Versatile, communicative, but also restless.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional, nurturing, but also moody.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident, passionate, but also arrogant.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical, hardworking, but also perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic, balanced, but also indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate, intense, but also secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous, optimistic, but also reckless.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambitious, disciplined, but also critical.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian, independent, but also rebellious.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Compassionate, imaginative, but also dreamy.
